title: Introductory Game
description: Welcome to the Introductory Game! This game is designed to help you get started and familiarize yourself with the gameplay mechanics.
rules: Rule 1: Each player takes turns rolling a dice.
Rule 2: Move your game piece forward the number of spaces indicated on the dice.
Rule 3: Follow the instructions on the game board for each space you land on.
Rule 4: The first player to reach the finish line wins the game.
Rule 5: Have fun and enjoy the game!

title: Strategy Game
description: Get ready for the Strategy Game! This game challenges your tactical skills and decision-making abilities.
rules: Rule 1: Each player starts with a set of game pieces.
Rule 2: Strategically position your game pieces on the board.
Rule 3: Plan your moves to outmaneuver your opponents and achieve your objectives.
Rule 4: Utilize special abilities or power-ups to gain an advantage.
Rule 5: The player with the best strategy and execution wins the game.

title: Trivia Game
description: Test your knowledge with the Trivia Game! Answer questions from various categories and see who knows the most.
rules: Rule 1: Players take turns answering trivia questions.
Rule 2: Correct answers earn points or rewards.
Rule 3: Incorrect answers may result in penalties or missed opportunities.
Rule 4: The player with the highest score at the end of the game wins.
Rule 5: Expand your knowledge while having a great time!
